scripts.check: pnpm -r lint && pnpm -r typecheck && pnpm -r test
scripts.gen: bun scripts/gen-openapi.ts && bun scripts/gen-prims.ts && bun scripts/gen-mcp.ts && bun scripts/gen-cli.ts && bun scripts/gen-tools.ts && bun scripts/gen-tests.ts && bun scripts/gen-docs.ts && bun scripts/gen-sdk.ts && bun scripts/gen-deploy.ts && bun scripts/gen-logos.ts && bun scripts/gen-og-images.ts
scripts.gen:check: bun scripts/gen-openapi.ts --check && bun scripts/gen-prims.ts --check && bun scripts/gen-mcp.ts --check && bun scripts/gen-cli.ts --check && bun scripts/gen-tools.ts --check && bun scripts/gen-tests.ts --check && bun scripts/gen-docs.ts --check && bun scripts/gen-sdk.ts --check && bun scripts/gen-deploy.ts --check
scripts.clean:worktrees: git worktree prune && git worktree list
